sentences.en: But when during a lifespan do proteins start to misbehave?
sentences.cn: 但是,在整个生命中,蛋白什么时候开始出现表达错误的 呢 ?

sentences.en: George has been misbehaving at school.
sentences.cn: 乔治最近在学校表现不好。

sentences.en: I'll disown you if you misbehave.
sentences.cn: 要是你不规矩,我就和你断绝关系.

sentences.en: If parents allow their children misbehave they're just playing into their hands.
sentences.cn: 如果父母任由孩子不守规矩就是让他们摆布了.

sentences.en: If you misbehave yourself once more, you'll be driven out of room.
sentences.cn: 如果你再不守规矩, 就会被赶出屋去.
如果你表现不好, 我就去告发你.

sentences.en: Mother: Susie, every time you misbehave, i get another gray hair.
sentences.cn: 母亲: 每次你表现不好, 我就多长一根白发.

sentences.en: Mother: Susie, every time you misbehave, I get another gray hair.
sentences.cn: 母亲: “苏茜, 每次你表现不好, 我就多长一根白头发. ”

sentences.en: Mother: Susie, every time you misbehave, I will get another gray hair.
sentences.cn: 母亲: 苏茜, 每次你表现不好, 我就会多长一根白头发.

sentences.en: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating.
sentences.cn: 孩子有不良行为时，小题大做可能适得其反。

sentences.en: Q: Does visiting new cities give you more licence to misbehave?
sentences.cn: 参观新城市给你更多放纵行为的许可了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Students have a tendency to misbehave themselves at exam time.
sentences.cn: 学生在考试时往往有违纪倾向。

sentences.en: TEACHER: And didn't I promise to punish you when you misbehave?
sentences.cn: 老师: 还有,我是不是说过如果你表现不好就要处罚你?

sentences.en: When the children misbehaved she was unable to cope.
sentences.cn: 当孩子们捣乱时，她无能为力。

sentences.en: When will a dog most likely misbehave?
sentences.cn: 小狗很可能在何时不守规矩?

sentences.en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
sentences.cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

sentences.en: Yep, and they got tons of wide - open spaces for you to play and misbehave in!
sentences.cn: 喔, 他们那儿还有广袤的天空任你玩耍和驰骋!

trans.tran_en: If someone, especially a child, misbehaves, they behave in a way that is not acceptable to other people
